argument.name: position
argument.description: The number of the first element to insert.

argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of elements to insert.

page.description: Insert entries into array, resize the array if needed.
page.discussion: The <ARRAY>.INSERT() method inserts Count entries in a single dimensional array starting at Position. If necessary, the array is resized to accommodate the additional entries.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim A[4] as C A[1] = "Orange" A[2] = "Banana" A[3] = "Apple" A[4] = "Pineapple"

section.description: Suppose we want to insert two values, "Pear" and "Mango", into the array. This could be accomplished as follows:
